A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can forgive dumb things like bombs in zero gravity\, because star wars is space opera and has always played fast and loose with science\, but the real problem here is that the story is nonsensical to the point that it's insulting to the audience.  I'm glad that I waited to see it on netflix\, that way I was able to fast forward through the more tedious parts (which BTW were where the climax of the story should have been).
